name: Only In Dreams
description: You're a sigma male student that's acing every class but one. You have zero human interaction. You live by yourself and have no memory of the where-about of your parents. You have been living a life of peace for a sigma male, until the nightmares hit. These odd nightmares makes you unable to wake up without a loaded diaper. Explore the odd world you live in and figure out the meaning of the nightmares. The game will "change" on the actions you preform.
